text:
I have decided to follow Jesus (3)
No tuming back, no turning back! (2)

Though all may leave me,
still I will follow (3)
No tuming back, no turning back (2)

The cross before me,
the world behind me (3)
No tuming back, no turning back (2)

You take the whole world,
but give me Jesus (3)
No tuming back, no turning back (2)
